text: Baffled by the decision at the WTO to give away American IP on COVID vaccines. Won’t do anything to remove vax barriers worldwide. Will make it harder to fight the next pandemic. Gives competitors a windfall. Terrible change of precedent.

Been following the global #COVID19 vaccine equity issue, and I agree with this. Hard to believe suspending IP protections would expand access. There's a vax surplus now. Reducing trade barriers and delivery challenges seems like better approach. Put me in the #noIPwaiver camp.

With the National Restaurant Association's Michelle Korsmo, Sean Kennedy and Scott Redler getting set to address #PAFC2022. @WeRRestaurants is doing a great job advocating for a thriving American restaurant and foodservice community. https://t.co/W7uBHnnGRU
Don Young was one of a kind. A leader devoted to his state and his constituents. A man with the courage to walk his own path and do things his own way. I miss him already. R.I.P. @repdonyoung

I am sad tonight but grateful for the friendship I had with Harry. We disagreed on many things, sometimes famously. But we were always honest with each other. In the years after we left public service, that honesty became a bond. Harry was a fighter until the end. RIP, my friend.

"Greatness lies not in what office you hold, but in how honest you are in how you face adversity and in your willingness to stand fast in hard places." -Bob Dole, 1996

Rest easy, my dear friend. https://t.co/Sel0qxljP2
Thank you @BCAToday @GovernorKayIvey for welcoming this Buckeye to the Yellowhammer State. A wonderful evening.
Congrats @TomRooney
#FreedomFoyer
Congratulations @ProcterGamble on your role in growing the increasingly important US-Africa business relationship.
At @TAonCapHill with my favorite dish!!! #VealAllaBoehner https://t.co/Ib8qX2J58I
ON THE HOUSE is out today. Join me on my virtual book tour. https://t.co/4jvTRbYGor

It was a 10-inch knife. I know because it was against my neck. And sharp. 

I was also proud as hell later to be your best man. With guys like @repdonyoung, you always know where you stand. That's why we're friends.
Join me on my virtual book tour for On the House: A Washington Memoir. Click the link to RSVP: https://t.co/ZPuILRKYfH
Congratulations to Tata Consultancy Services (@TCS_NA) for the great work being done for students and teachers across America through the #IgniteMyFuture in School initiative.
Poured myself a glass of something nice to read my audiobook. You can blame the wine for the expletives. #OnTheHouse #13Apr2021 https://t.co/5uN709ipOs
Welcoming Kathleen @Sebelius to the @FollowNCR team and honored to be working with her for common sense American cannabis reform.
https://t.co/OVOuq6mEKb https://t.co/KuKKKZlIVK

I once said the party of Lincoln and Reagan is off taking a nap. The nap has become a nightmare for our nation. The GOP must awaken. The invasion of our Capitol by a mob, incited by lies from some entrusted with power, is a disgrace to all who sacrificed to build our Republic.

Congratulations President-elect @JoeBiden. I know you’re sincere in your desire to be a president for all Americans, and I know you’ve got the tools and the heart to get it done. #Laetare https://t.co/ZHoZ43AhyK
Congratulations to AG Bill Barr of @TheJusticeDept for his service. Didn't have to come back, but did so to clean things up in the bureaucracy. A true American Patriot.

If you're planning to brine your #Thanksgiving turkey, today's the day to make the brine. In case you need it, here's my famous recipe, courtesy @Enquirer. #BoehnerBrine #HappyThanksgiving
https://t.co/6E8zEV9sw8

My friends at @iFoodDS are partnering with @Cornell University on strategies for minimizing #COVID19 among workers at food processing facilities, a project made possible through a rapid response grant from @USDA_NIFA. #Thanksgiving #FoodSafety https://t.co/vOUmKULZPo

50 years ago today, the earthly lives of three of my @MoellerHS classmates ended in the @MarshallU plane crash. I've never forgotten them. I never will. May God bless the souls of all we lost that day. #ClassOf68 #MenOfMoeller #BrothersForever ⁦@BigMoeFootball⁩ https://t.co/OVKpJY5xbk
Looking forward to it. @SPB_CapThinking @SPB_Global

@US_FDA is moving to shape the future of food safety in America through its New Era of Smarter Food Safety Blueprint. In a new blog post, my friends at @iFoodDS share some thoughts on the role #traceability plays in #SmarterFoodSafety.
Glad to see employers like @Aon_plc bringing companies together in America and beyond to support recovery and help reopen the economy safely. #WorkTravelConvene
@sholtzsf @WolfVanHalen BMug

Col. Samuel Robert Johnson embodied all that it means to be an American. Humble, principled, selfless, devoted to family and country. He was my compass as Speaker. That was the least of his contributions to the nation he served and loved. Rest in well-earned peace, Sam.
Going live in just a few minutes. @GACCWest @SPB_Global @DIHK @SPB_CapThinking

COVID-19 has created new challenges for America’s food supply. Great to see @WesternGrowers, @iFoodDecisionSc and @LGMANews partnering to use technology to support US #foodsafety. #qualityassurance #agtech
Looking forward to joining @abiworld, @Sen_JoeManchin and @SPB_Global colleagues for this dialogue next week on Reopening America. @SPB_CapThinking
Big development in the effort to ensure US food safety through technology, more important today than ever. Congrats to @HarvestMark and @iFoodDecisionSc. #FoodSafety #SupplyChain #QualityAssurance

I’ll be appearing on @FoxBusiness @TeamCavuto today around 1:00pm ET to talk economy, COVID-19, “stimulus” and the #pensioncrisis...if I can figure out how to get this Skype thing to work. @RetireCoalition @SPB_CapThinking https://t.co/M2a6KvAWaI

Wishing all the best to my buddy PM @BorisJohnson on his road to recovery. You can’t keep a good man down. #StayHomeSaveLives #BeatCoronaVirus

When I think of Tom Coburn, I think of a legislator who was hard-working, steady and principled, in public service for the right reasons. He was also a dear friend. Farewell, brother. Rest easy.

.@JoeCrowleyNY and I joined Fox & Friends on behalf of @RetireCoalition to talk about the multiemployer #pensioncrisis that is devastating millions of Americans from #Ohio to #NewYork. Watch the interview here: https://t.co/7rMq3LEozm
A heartfelt Boehnerland congratulations to  @SofiaBoza and @RepKinzinger. So happy for you both!!

Construction workers, truck drivers, bakers, and musicians have worked hard to earn a secure retirement. The @RetireCoalition is encouraged to see the White House’s budget proposal confirm the need for urgent action on the multiemployer #pensioncrisis. https://t.co/Z45GV7tx1z
The Speaker and the Captain. #EarthsMightiestHeroes @ChrisEvans #AStartingPoint https://t.co/V3BAMJUImt

Finding a solution to the multiemployer #pensioncrisis will take political courage, but it’s the right thing to do and millions of Americans depend on it. Learn more about @RetireCoalition’s vision to strengthen the state of this union. #SOTU https://t.co/ncMVLJuVVQ

As a leader of the @RetireCoalition, I share a belief with most Americans that there is a very urgent need for meaningful, bipartisan action to find a shared solution to the multiemployer #pensioncrisis. By #SOTU 2021, let’s get this done. https://t.co/Bh2xLa5Yje
Happy 80th birthday to the Golden Bear, the great @JackNicklaus. A living legend. https://t.co/lijnOkdDkp

Protecting Americans’ #retirement security can’t wait a day longer when people need help now. Seven pension plans failed last year, and according to @ReutersMoney, 12 more plans are expected to fail in 2020. https://t.co/gFtB3yRRkS

Millions of retirees and hard-working Americans are threatened by the multiemployer #pensioncrisis that grows more urgent by the day. According to the @washingtonpost, time is running out and a bipartisan compromise is needed. Read the editorial here: https://t.co/XxY0JcB2jg https://t.co/uuR2IBcH1F
Team captain puts himself out first tonight in singles matches in Australia. Wins big. Really gutsy move for his team! Great job @TigerWoods. #PresidentsCup2019
Thanksgiving, the Boehner way. Happy Thanksgiving from my family to you and yours. https://t.co/LDx3XDKLFA
Thank you, Newt. I’m honored to have served with you, and I learned so much from you. I’m grateful for our friendship.

NEW POLL: Polling from @RetireCoalition shows Americans overwhelmingly (92%) believe protecting retirees is essential to our economy, and 3 in 4 Ohioans say multiemployer pensions are in crisis and America can’t afford to wait. https://t.co/lNPeb0doK3
Watch my full @TeamCavuto interview to learn more about the multiemployer pension crisis and why Americans want to solve it now. There’s got to be a shared solution. https://t.co/F63YYa7t6a

I sat down with @TeamCavuto and @JoeCrowleyNY to talk about new polling from @RetireCoalition that shows voters recognize the urgent need for meaningful, bipartisan action to protect retirees and workers from today’s #pensioncrisis.  https://t.co/qmD7ZFXMXb
“From the bottom of my heart, thank you...God Bless you, God Bless this Capitol, and God Bless the United States of America.” https://t.co/U38EemxOhn

America will miss the public service of @RepGregWalden. One of the finest people I served with. I’m grateful for his friendship and salute him for what he has accomplished in his years of service to his constituents and country.
Correct.

The Detroit Carpenters’ Pension Trust Fund is one of the latest pension plans making the case to cut benefits by as much as 26% to avoid insolvency. The crisis is here, which is why @RetireCoalition is sending the message: Americans need help now. https://t.co/TQAnHvVWTP

.@JoeCrowleyNY and I "know all too well when something doesn't get fixed in D.C., it can end up hurting people back home. When it comes to the multiemployer pension plan crisis, the effects are already real." To learn more, read our piece in
@CNNBusiness. https://t.co/rccbz5jXJ0

Left unchecked, today's #pensioncrisis will decimate the retirement future of millions. That's why I joined @JoeCrowleyNY to launch @RetireCoalition and sound the alarm that inaction leaves Americans out to dry. Read our @CNNBusiness piece to learn more: https://t.co/rccbz5jXJ0

Americans need an urgent solution to the multiemployer pension plan crisis that helps us protect millions of miners, truckers, bakers, construction workers, and musicians' hard-earned retirement. Learn more about @RetireCoalition here: https://t.co/865fRRMCYZ #RetirementSecurity

National Cannabis Roundtable (@FollowNCR) will lead the drive for common sense cannabis law. Pleased to be honorary chair of an industry effort to transform and modernize national cannabis policy and ensure it is done safely, thoughtfully, comprehensively. https://t.co/VB0f4Qr7hA
Farewell and RIP @JohnDingell, one of the greats and the very definition of a man of the House. I am blessed to have known and served with him.
Thank you Marty Brennaman for being the voice of the @Reds for a generation. You’re the best of the best.

Farewell to one of the great American statesmen of our time. “41” graced all of us with his dignity, strength and courage. He gave enormously to our country, and to the cause of freedom. He was a great man.

From her scrappy demeanor and no-frills style to her boundless passion for family, literacy and freedom, Barbara Bush was America at its best.  Her children were blessed to call her mother; our country blessed to call her First Lady. She’ll live on in the heart of our Nation.
